html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2012-07672012-06-07,  ,  ND,  , 
ActNational Defence Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Queen's Regulations and Orders for the Canadian Forces
PrecisRegulations Amending the QUEEN'S REGULATIONS AND ORDERS FOR THE CANADIAN FORCES in order to (1) create a regulation that will allow travel at public expense of next of kin who attend events following the death of a Canadian Forces member; and (2) amend existing regulations to allow travel at public expense of honorary appointees, when they are visiting the unit to which they are appointed or attending events related to their functions as honorary appointees.
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Queen's Regulations and Orders for the Canadian Forces
precis: Regulations Amending the QUEEN'S REGULATIONS AND ORDERS FOR THE CANADIAN FORCES in order to (1) create a regulation that will allow travel at public expense of next of kin who attend events following the death of a Canadian Forces member; and (2) amend existing regulations to allow travel at public expense of honorary appointees, when they are visiting the unit to which they are appointed or attending events related to their functions as honorary appointees.
